DzBoneBinding Class Reference
[Object and Geometry Classes]

A class that specifies the weight maps associated with an individual bone for a skin binding. More...

#include <dzbonebinding.h>

enum  LocalAveragingOption {
  FIRST_AXIS = 0x01, SECOND_AXIS = 0x02, THIRD_AXIS = 0x04, SCALE_MAP = 0x08,
  USE_GENERAL_MAP = 0x10, DEFAULT_AVERAGE = USE_GENERAL_MAP | SECOND_AXIS | THIRD_AXIS
}

Detailed Description

A class that specifies the weight maps associated with an individual bone for a skin binding.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum DzBoneBinding::LocalAveragingOption

Options to specify which local maps to use with methods on this class. These options can be or-ed together.

See also:
DzBoneBinding::createAveragedGeneralMap()
Enumerator:
FIRST_AXIS 

Indicates that the local map for the first axis should be used

SECOND_AXIS 

Indicates that the local map for the second axis should be used

THIRD_AXIS 

Indicates that the local map for the third axis should be used

SCALE_MAP 

Indicates that the local scale map should be used

USE_GENERAL_MAP 

Indicates that the local general map should be used

DEFAULT_AVERAGE 

The bitwise-or of DzBoneBinding::USE_GENERAL_MAP, DzBoneBinding::SECOND_AXIS, and DzBoneBinding::THIRD_AXIS

Member Function Documentation

bool DzBoneBinding::appliedLocal (  )  const
Returns:
true if the bone binding was applied using X, Y, and Z rotation maps, false if it was applied with the general map in the last/current modifier run.
bool DzBoneBinding::appliedScale (  )  const
Returns:
true if the scale map for the bone binding was applied in the last/current modifier run.
void DzBoneBinding::bindingMatrixChanged (  )  [signal]

Emitted when the binding matrix for this binding has been changed

Emitted when the bone for this binding has been changed

Parameters:
bone The new bone associated with this binding
void DzBoneBinding::calcScaledOrigin (  ) 

Called by the framework to calculate the scaled origin for the bone with the current transforms.

DzVec3 DzBoneBinding::calcScaledOrigin ( QHash< DzNode *, DzVec3 > *  boneScaleMap,
bool  atdefault 
) const
Returns:
Calculated scaled origin of the bone.
DzWeightMapPtr DzBoneBinding::createAveragedGeneralMap ( LocalAveragingOptions  options = DEFAULT_AVERAGE  ) 
Parameters:
options which local maps to average to create the new generalize map.
Returns:
If USE_GENERAL_MAP is specified and this bone has a general map, a copy of the general map is returned. Otherwise an average of the maps specified by options is returned. Null is returned if no maps match the options specified.
void DzBoneBinding::currentValueChanged (  )  [signal]

Emitted when the current value for this binding has been changed

DzMatrix3 DzBoneBinding::getBindingMatrix (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The matrix that puts the base geometry in the local space of the bone.
DzNode * DzBoneBinding::getBone (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The bone that is bound to the mesh by this binding.
DzBulgeBinding * DzBoneBinding::getBulgeBinding ( int  axis  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
axis The axis of the bulge to return - 0, 1, or 2 for X, Y, or Z.
Returns:
The bulge on the given axis for the binding, or NULL if none.
DzWeightMap * DzBoneBinding::getLocalWeights ( int  axis  )  const [slot]
Parameters:
axis The axis of the map to return - 0, 1, or 2 for X, Y, or Z.
Returns:
The local weight map on the given axis for the binding, or NULL if none.
DzVec3 DzBoneBinding::getScaledOrigin (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The scaled origin that was calculated for the last/current modifier run. This is the origin of the bone with all current scaling transforms up to the skeleton accumulated in.
DzWeightMap * DzBoneBinding::getScaleWeights (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The scale weight map for the binding, or NULL if none.
DzWeightMap * DzBoneBinding::getWeights (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
The general weight map for the binding, or NULL if none.
bool DzBoneBinding::hasBulgeWeights (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if the X, Y, or Z bulge bindings are non-NULL, false if none of the bulge bindings are set.
bool DzBoneBinding::hasLocalWeights (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
true if the X, Y, or Z rotation maps are non-NULL, false if none of the maps are set.
void DzBoneBinding::invalidateWeights (  )  [slot]

Marks the weights on this binding as having changed, and notifies the skin binding of the need for an update. Emits the weightsChanged() and currentValueChanged() signals.

DzError DzBoneBinding::setBulgeBinding ( DzBulgeBinding *  bulge,
int  axis 
) [slot]

Sets or clears the bulge bindings associated with the bone.

Parameters:
bulge The bulge binding to use as the bone's bulge for the given axis, or NULL to clear the existing bulge.
axis The axis that the bulge will bind to - 0, 1, or 2 for X, Y, or Z.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.

Parameters:

DzError DzBoneBinding::setLocalWeights ( DzWeightMap *  map,
int  axis 
) [slot]

Sets or clears the local rotation weight maps associated with the bone.

Parameters:
map The weight map to use as the bone's local binding map for the given axis, or NULL to clear the existing map.
axis The axis that the weight map will bind to - 0, 1, or 2 for X, Y, or Z.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
void DzBoneBinding::setPointer ( const DzInFile *  file,
short  sectionID,
short  pointerID,
DzBase *  ptr 
) [virtual]

Called by the framework when reading a native file. Reimplemented from DzElement. This method will be called with the sectionID and pointerID that were given when writing the file out. The passed pointer may be shared so should not be deleted.

Parameters:
file The file being loaded
sectionID The ID of the file section being read
pointerID The ID of the pointer being read.
ptr The pointer being read.

Reimplemented from DzElement.

DzError DzBoneBinding::setScaleWeights ( DzWeightMap *  map  )  [slot]

Sets or clears the scale weight map associated with the bone.

Parameters:
map The weight map to use as the bone's scale binding map, or NULL to clear the existing map.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
void DzBoneBinding::setStorablePaths ( const QString &  path  )  [virtual]

Classes that contain items derived from DzStorable should override this method to give them a chance to set their storage path. The path passed is relative (no leading drive letter or root path). Reimplemented from DzElement.

Parameters:
path The base path for storables.

Reimplemented from DzBase.

DzError DzBoneBinding::setWeights ( DzWeightMap *  map  )  [slot]

Sets or clears the general weight map associated with the bone.

Parameters:
map The weight map to use as the bone's general binding map, or NULL to clear the existing map.
Returns:
DZ_NO_ERROR on success, otherwise an error code.
